commit.message: Manually add `clippy::version` attribute to deprecated lints

verification.payload:
tree f315b1a2579e8ca3739eb738c161ead01431baab
parent 23ed79260baa31c24610a42470d379dd434b025a
author xFrednet <xFrednet@gmail.com> 1634482633 +0200
committer xFrednet <xFrednet@gmail.com> 1636570110 +0100

Manually add `clippy::version` attribute to deprecated lints

files.patch:
@@ -18,7 +18,7 @@ static DEC_CLIPPY_LINT_RE: SyncLazy<Regex> = SyncLazy::new(|| {
         r#"(?x)
     declare_clippy_lint!\s*[\{(]
     (?:\s+///.*)*
-    (?:\s*\#\[clippy::version\s*=\s*"[^"]*"\])
+    (?:\s*\#\[clippy::version\s*=\s*"[^"]*"\])?
     \s+pub\s+(?P<name>[A-Z_][A-Z_0-9]*)\s*,\s*
     (?P<cat>[a-z_]+)\s*,\s*
     "(?P<desc>(?:[^"\\]+|\\(?s).(?-s))*)"\s*[})]
@@ -32,6 +32,7 @@ static DEC_DEPRECATED_LINT_RE: SyncLazy<Regex> = SyncLazy::new(|| {
         r#"(?x)
     declare_deprecated_lint!\s*[{(]\s*
     (?:\s+///.*)*
+    (?:\s*\#\[clippy::version\s*=\s*"[^"]*"\])?
     \s+pub\s+(?P<name>[A-Z_][A-Z_0-9]*)\s*,\s*
     "(?P<desc>(?:[^"\\]+|\\(?s).(?-s))*)"\s*[})]
 "#,
